articles.author: BeauHD
articles.title: Google Releases Flutter 3.7, Teases Future of App Development Framework
articles.description: An anonymous reader quotes a report from 9to5Google: At the Flutter Forward event, Google released Flutter 3.7 with more Material You widgets and menus support, while also teasing the future of the app development framework. Having grown from humble beginning…
